name: Warhammer 40,000: Dark Nexus Arena
description:
Warhammer 40,000: Dark Nexus Arena is an action, RPG and strategy game developed by Whitebox Interactive. It came out on 09-12-2015. Whitebox Interactive published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Warhammer 40,000: Dark Nexus Arena is available on PC.
It was scored by Jeff van Dyck.
